Key Match Events: Malik Monk recorded 17 points off the bench
James Harden went 9-9 from the free throw line
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game took nearly 90 minutes to get through the first 25 minutes of play
The Kings shot 11.5% (3-26) from the 3-point line
DeMar DeRozan's streak of 20+ points per game was ended
Others: The Kings remain competitive despite their poor shooting performance
The Clippers hammered the final nails in by hitting three consecutive 3s in the final two minutes
